cast.name: 索菲亚·班茨哈夫 Sofia Banzhaf

introduction: A tattoo studio becomes the site for an emotionally charged reunion between a woman and the now-grown person she used to babysit. Twelve years after their last meeting, Kaatali is forced to contend with the expectations of someone from a different time in her life, stirring up emotions that are more than skin deep. An intimate portrayal of a chance, lopsided reunion, Aftercare touches on themes of memory, reconciliation, and the importance of children’s relationships.
